name: The Great Extraterrestrial Cook Off
description:
Earthlings and their refrigerators get abducted by aliens only to be placed in a cooking competition for picky extraterrestrial judges. Our hero must please the judges with his cooking skills or he, along with the rest of the earthlings will be devoured.

This is a project I created while taking a game design class at the University of Florida. It is short with only 2 levels, but it is complete. 

Download the soundtrack from bandcamp: https://laughingbuffalo.bandcamp.com/
